works.complaint:
The above URL contains a PDF document with  
unsubstantiated allegations that I am mob connected and have the propensity  
for violence. These statements were made to an inquiry on real estate  
mattes by a business competitor who did not declare himself as such. The  
statements are untrue. I am happy to furnish a current police report from  
police in the state of Victoria, Australia that shows I have no  
convictions. I have never been; visited, investigate, questioned or charged  
with any matter regarding the offending statements. I hold professional  
qualifications which could not be held if these criminal allegations of  
violence or mob practices, contained in the above URL, were true.

I new reside in the Philippines. This offending link above is defamatory in  
the Philippines where I propose to commence action against Google. My legal  
advice is the the recent passage of the Philippines Cyber Crime law would  
support my claim outside the jurisdiction where the claims were maid.
